attributes.additional_details: The government should help their own people get by. No one should be struggling in this weather to heat their homes. Power their tv or even eat because the cost of utilities is extremely high. Utilities being publicly owned will solve this issue out, keep people in work and also help families on a low budget income
attributes.background: As we all know, all utilities I.E Gas, Electric, Water ECT used to be publicly owned until Margaret Thatcher sold everything on for a profit. Now look at the boat we are all in. All of our own people are now struggling to make ends meet while corporate companies are making huge profits.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621658
